title: Angela Rayner – 2023 Comments on the Personal Conduct of Nadhim Zahawi
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Angela Rayner, the Deputy Leader of the Labour Party, on Twitter on 23 January 2023.
content:
Nadhim Zahawi’s position is clearly untenable. Every hour that Rishi Sunak refuses to sack him shows just how weak the Prime Minister is.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
